products.title: Products cards
products.description: Ensure all product information is accurate and up-to-date to maintain inventory integrity and optimize sales performance.
products.noIssuesMessage: ðŸŽ‰ All product data looks great! No issues found. ðŸš€ Ready to add more products?

101.title: Products Missing Images
101.description: Add at least one image to these products.

102.title: Products Missing Default Prices
102.description: Ensure these products have valid default prices.

103.title: Products with Inactive Bills of Materials
103.description: Activate all bills of materials for these manufacturable products.

104.title: Bundle Products with Inactive Items
104.description: Activate all items in these bundle products.

105.title: Products Missing Variations
105.description: Add required variations to these configurable products.

106.title: Bundle Products Missing Items
106.description: Add items to these bundle products.

107.title: Manufacturable Products Missing Bills of Materials
107.description: Add bills of materials to these manufacturable products.

108.title: Products Missing Supplier Products
108.description: Add supplier products to these products.

109.title: Products Missing EAN Codes
109.description: Provide EAN codes for these products.

110.title: Product Type Missing
110.description: Assign a product type to these products.

111.title: Products Missing Required Properties
111.description: Assign all required properties to these products.

112.title: Products Missing Optional Properties
112.description: Assign optional properties to these products as needed.

113.title: Supplier Products Missing Required Prices
113.description: Add required prices to these supplier products.

114.title: Products Missing Stock
114.description: Ensure these products have stock or allow backorder.

115.title: Products Missing Lead Time When Out of Stock
115.description: Specify lead times for these products when out of stock.

116.title: Manual Price List Prices Missing Override Prices
116.description: Add override prices to manual price list prices where auto-update is disabled.

117.title: Variation Product Type Mismatch
117.description: Ensure all variations have the same product type.

118.title: Items with Different Product Types
118.description: Ensure all items have the same product type.

119.title: Bills of Materials with Different Product Types
119.description: Ensure all bills of materials have the same product type.

120.title: Items with Missing Mandatory Information
120.description: Resolve missing mandatory information in these items' inspectors.

121.title: Variations with Missing Mandatory Information
121.description: Resolve missing mandatory information in these variations' inspectors.

122.title: Bills of Materials with Missing Mandatory Information
122.description: Resolve missing mandatory information in these bills of materials' inspectors.

123.title: Configurable Products with Duplicate Variations
123.description: Ensure variations in these configurable products have unique required properties.

124.title: Configurable Product Missing Rule Configuration
124.description: Define at least one configurator required item for these configurable products.

orders.title: Orders cards
orders.description: Stay on top of your orders by monitoring pending, processed, and shipped orders to ensure timely deliveries and customer satisfaction.

pendingOrders.title: Pending Orders
pendingOrders.description: Orders that are pending processing or awaiting inventory.

ongoingShipments.title: Ongoing Shipments
ongoingShipments.description: Shipments that need to be prepared.

general.title: General cards
general.description: Improve your data quality by resolving the following issues.
general.noIssuesMessage: âœ… Everything is in order! No outstanding tasks. ðŸŽ¯ You're all set for now!

missingLeadTime.title: Addresses Missing Lead Time
missingLeadTime.description: Some addresses do not have a lead time set. This may affect delivery estimates and logistics planning. Please review and update the lead times for these addresses.

currencyMismatchPriceLists.title: Price Lists with Currency Mismatched Customers
currencyMismatchPriceLists.description: Some price lists are associated with customers whose currencies do not match the price list's currency. This can lead to pricing errors and billing inconsistencies.

propertiesMissingMainTranslation.title: Properties Missing Main Translation
propertiesMissingMainTranslation.description: These properties lack translations for your company's main language.

propertiesMissingTranslations.title: Properties Missing Translations
propertiesMissingTranslations.description: These properties are not translated into all required languages.

propertySelectValuesMissingMainTranslati.title: Select Values Missing Main Language
propertySelectValuesMissingMainTranslati.description: Some select values lack translations for your company's main language.

propertySelectValuesMissingTranslations.title: Select Values Missing Translations
propertySelectValuesMissingTranslations.description: Some select values are missing translations for all required languages.

propertiesUsedInProductsMissingMainTrans.title: Properties Used in Products Missing Main Translation
propertiesUsedInProductsMissingMainTrans.description: These properties are used in products and lack translations for your company's main language.

propertiesUsedInProductsMissingTranslati.title: Properties Used in Products Missing Translations
propertiesUsedInProductsMissingTranslati.description: These properties are used in products and are not translated into all required languages.

propertySelectValuesUsedInProductsMissin.title: Select Values Used in Products Missing Main Language
propertySelectValuesUsedInProductsMissin.description: Some select values used in products lack translations for your company's main language.

propertySelectValuesUsedInProductsMissin.title: Select Values Used in Products Missing Translations
propertySelectValuesUsedInProductsMissin.description: Some select values used in products are missing translations for all required languages.

amazon.title: Amazon integration
amazon.description: Resolve unmapped Amazon data to keep your marketplace in sync.

unmappedProductTypes.title: Unmapped Product Types
unmappedProductTypes.description: Amazon product types that need mapping.

unmappedLocalProductTypes.title: Unmapped OneSila Product Types
unmappedLocalProductTypes.description: OneSila product types that need mapping to Amazon.

unmappedSelectValues.title: Unmapped Select Values
unmappedSelectValues.description: Amazon property values that need mapping in order to be imported into OneSila.

unmappedDefaultUnitConfigurators.title: Default Unit Configurator
unmappedDefaultUnitConfigurators.description: Amazon unit configurators missing a default unit.

productsWithIssues.title: Products With Issues
productsWithIssues.description: Amazon products that failed to sync correctly.

onboarding.completedMessage: Congratulations! You have successfully completed all the onboarding steps. You are now ready to fully utilize the platform and take advantage of all its features. Start exploring and make the most of OneSila to drive innovation and success for your business.

cards.dependenciesNotMeetWarning: You need to follow the following steps first:

createProductType.title: Define a Product Type
createProductType.details: Create product type options (e.g., 'Chair', 'Pen') to group your products.

uploadProductImage.title: Add Product Image
uploadProductImage.details: Upload an image to your product.

addEANCode.title: Add EAN Code
addEANCode.details: Enter your product's EAN code. You can update or remove it later.

createPriceList.title: Create Price List
createPriceList.details: Set up a price list to organize and manage your product pricing. Update it when your prices change.

createProperty.title: Create Custom Property
createProperty.details: Make a new property to add extra details about your product. For example, create a 'Brand' property.

assignPropertyToProductType.title: Attach Property to Product Type
assignPropertyToProductType.details: Link your custom property to a product type. For instance, attach the 'Brand' property to the 'Pen' product type.

setProductPropertyValue.title: Set Product Property Value
setProductPropertyValue.details: Assign the correct value to your product's property. For example, set 'Brand' to 'Parker' for your pen.

product.title: Create a Simple Product
product.details: Products can be simple or configurable. Start by creating a simple product, such as a pen, to understand the basics.

progress.details: Complete all the steps to become a master of OneSila and make the most of its features.

member.title: Invite other team-members
member.details: Collaborate with your team to manage the business operations or data.

generateDemoData.title: Demo Data
generateDemoData.subTitle: Welcome to OneSila
generateDemoData.content: Do you want to create Demo Data?
generateDemoData.demoDataExplanation: Demo data is a set of fake data that helps you try the platform. It includes various sample entries to showcase the functionalities of OneSila.
generateDemoData.demoDataDeletionInfo: All and only the demo data can be deleted from your profile with a single click button.

addCompany.title: Company
addCompany.subTitle: Tell us a little about your company.
addCompany.content: Providing your company details helps us stay in touch and offer better support when needed.

addCurrency.title: Currency
addCurrency.subTitle: Set up the currency you use by default.
addCurrency.content: This will help us track prices.  You can add more currencies later.

confirmVatRate.title: VAT Rate
confirmVatRate.subTitle: Set your company's VAT rate
confirmVatRate.content: We'll use this rate to raise invoices and caluclate prices. More rates can be added later.

createInventoryLocation.title: Inventory Location
createInventoryLocation.subTitle: Create a first inventory location.
createInventoryLocation.content: You can create a first location here. Eg Shelf 1 or Storage Unit. More can be added later - or you can skip this entirely.

mutationAlert.title: Are you sure?
mutationAlert.text: Approving WILL remove the information from all your sales channels as well.

toast.submitSuccessCreate: Your entry has been successfully created!
toast.submitSuccessUpdate: Your changes have been saved successfully!
toast.deleteSuccess: The item has been successfully deleted.
toast.unexpectedResult: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
toast.protectedDelete: Cannot delete this item because it is being used elsewhere.
toast.deletionFailed: Deletion operation failed. Please contact the administrators.
toast.clipboardSuccess: Your text was successfully copied to the clipboard
toast.tooLongError: {fieldName} is too long. Reduce to maximum {max} characters!
toast.bulkDeleteError: An error occurred while deleting items.

alert.noData: The rule has no required in configurator properties, therefore we can't generate variation based on that

dropZone.multipleDraggingInstruction: Drag and drop files here or click to upload
dropZone.singleDraggingInstruction: Drag and drop a file here or click to upload

bulkProductPropertyAssigner.title: To assign to {count} product(s)
bulkProductPropertyAssigner.assignSuccess: Properties were successfully assigned to the selected products.

aiBulkTranslator.title: Translate {count} {type}
aiBulkTranslator.description: This tool uses AI to auto-translate the selected entities. You'll be able to preview and confirm translations in the next step (coming soon).
aiBulkTranslator.startedToast: Translation started. The process is running in the background.
aiBulkTranslator.overrideCheckbox: Override existing translations if already present

error.missingLanguages: Please select both source and target languages.
error.general: Something went wrong while starting the translation.

aiContentGenerator.title: Generating content...
aiContentGenerator.success: Content successfully generated. It cost {points} SilAI Credit(s).

aiContentTranslator.title: Translating content...
aiContentTranslator.success: Content successfully translated. It cost {points} SilAI Credit(s).

aiBulletPointsGenerator.title: Generating bullet points...
aiBulletPointsGenerator.success: Bullet points successfully generated. It cost {points} SilAI Credit(s).

acceptInvitation.description: You are one step away. Please set you password and let's get it started!

login.description: Enter your username and password to login

register.description: Enter your username and password to register

company.languageDisclaimer: The company language CANNOT BE CHANGED LATER ON
company.aiPointsMessage: These are your SilAI Credits, your unique currency for all AI-powered processes.

helpText.language: This is your company's default language. All translatable content will be created in this language. This cannot be changed later.
helpText.languages: These are the languages your company will support for translations. You can update this list later.

recover.descriptionSent: An email was sent to the provided email. Please check the email for further instructions.
recover.descriptionCountdown: Your recovery link will expire in:
recover.description: Enter your email to recover your account
recover.tokenDescription: You are one step away. Please confirm your account recovery.

profile.unsavedChanges: You have unapplied changes. Are you sure you want to abort?

messages.changePasswordMatch: The passwords should match in order to update!

messages.unsavedChanges: You have unapplied changes. Are you sure you want to abort?
messages.changePasswordMatch: The passwords should match in order to update!

eanCodes.title: Ean Codes

invalidEanCodeAlert.title: This EAN code looks invalid
invalidEanCodeAlert.text: The code you've entered does not pass EAN-13 validation rules. Are you sure you want to continue?

prefix.content: The prefix is the first part of an EAN-13 barcode and is assigned by GS1. It uniquely identifies your company and ensures that all generated EAN codes follow a structured format. Make sure to use the correct GS1 prefix assigned to your company to avoid conflicts with other organizations.

help.externalEanCode: An external EAN Code is one that is not generated by our platform.

eanCodes.generateSuccessfully: EAN Code generation process started.  Come back later to see the result.

assign.disclaimer: Select one of the available supplier EAN Codes
assign.assign: Assign an available internal EAN Code
assign.release: Release EAN Code? NOTE: keep in mind that it will no longer be available for other products.
assign.error: No EAN Codes available.  Assign codes to the supplier products, or purchase some codes from GS1

toast.bulkDeleteError: Failed to delete EAN codes. Please try again.

success.assignBulk: Successfully assigned EAN codes to {count} product(s)

warning.noAvailable: No EAN codes could be assigned

error.assignBulk: An error occurred while assigning EAN codes

translation.confirmLanguageChange: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to change the language? This will discard any unsaved changes.
translation.successfullyUpdated: The product translation has been successfully updated.

warning.inheritFromDefault: Fields left empty will be inherited from the Default version for this language in the final product content.

addVariations.dragAndDrop: Use drag and drop or âž• button to add new products

toast.bulkDeleteError: Failed to delete products. Please try again.

amazon.validationIssuesDescription: Likely Amazon validation issues based on the product structure Amazon expects
amazon.gtinExemptionDescription: Enable if this product is exempt from GTIN requirements for this marketplace.
amazon.otherIssuesDescription: Issues raised by Amazon after you create/update a product. These often take 15 to 45 minutes to appear as Amazon will process these after you publish your changes.
amazon.noStatus: The product is not present yet on the marketplace!
amazon.variationThemeDescription: Select which fields properties you want people to select when choosing the right product.
amazon.asinDescription: Provide the Amazon Standard Identification Number for this product.
amazon.externalProductIdDescription: Provide the product identifier for this marketplace. If left empty, the system will use the product's EAN code.
amazon.defaultMarketplaceFallback: Value missing. The default marketplace value will be used.
amazon.browseNodeDescription: Select the browse node for this product.
amazon.createProductTypeConfirm: This will create and map the product type "{type}". Do you want to continue?

errors.116: Manual price list price should have at least override price
errors.119: Bill of materials have different product types
errors.120: Items have inspectors missing mandatory information
errors.122: Some Bill of materials are incomplete
errors.124: Product type rule is not configured for a configurable product

help.101: add at least one image to the product
help.102: ensure that the product has a valid default price
help.103: ensure all bills of materials of the manufacturable product are active
help.104: ensure all items in the bundle product are active
help.105: add at least one variation to the configurable product
help.106: add items to the bundle product
help.107: add bill of materials to the manufacturable product
help.108: add supplier products to the product
help.109: Set an EAN code for on product
help.110: add the product type to the product
help.111: ensure all required properties are assigned to the product
help.112: ensure all optional properties are assigned to the product
help.113: add at least one price to the supplier product
help.114: ensure the product has stock or allows backorders
help.115: specify the lead time for the product when out of stock
help.116: ensure manual price list prices have an override price if auto-update is disabled
help.117: ensure all variations have the same product type
help.118: ensure all items have the same product type
help.119: ensure all bill of materials have the same product type
help.120: resolve missing mandatory information in the items
help.121: resolve missing mandatory information in the variations
help.122: resolve missing mandatory information in the bills of materials
help.123: ensure all variations have a different configuration on their configurable properties
help.124: define at least one configurator required item on the product type rule

stepOne.content: Select what product are you trying to create?

variable.title: Simple
variable.example: Eg: A black pen that you buy and or sell.

bundle.title: Bundle
bundle.example: Eg: A notebook and pen sold together.

configurable.title: Configurable
configurable.example: Eg: Let customers pick between a red or blue pen.

manufacturable.title: Manufacturable
manufacturable.example: Eg: A mug and sticker bought separately, assembled and sold together.

dropship.title: Dropshipping
dropship.example: Eg: Furniture shipped directly from the manufacturer to the customer.

alias.title: Alias
alias.example: Eg: The same pen sold as both a 'Stylus Pen' and a 'Fountain Pen' for SEO purposes.

stepAlias.title: Alias Settings
stepAlias.content: Link this product to an existing one and choose what to reuse.

helpText.copyImages: If enabled, all images from the original product will be copied to this alias product.
helpText.copyProperties: If enabled, product attributes (e.g. color, material) from the original product will be cloned.

stepThree.title: Pricing
stepThree.content: How much do you sell it for?

simple.title: Sale status
simple.content: Is this item for Sale, or for internal use?

configurable.title: Variations
configurable.generateDescription: Choose property values below. Variations for all selected values will be generated automatically.

simple.title: Buying
simple.add: You bought this product before? Just add it.
simple.create: Please fill the form about the product you bought and intend to sell. You can leave it empty and add leter.

manufacturable.title: Bills Of Materials
manufacturable.selectVariations: Please add the used bills of materials for the product

duplicateModal.description: Provide an SKU for the duplicated product or leave empty to auto generate.

virtual.title: Guided Virtual Tour Packaging
virtual.description: Use your mobile device to get step-by-step directions through the warehouse, guiding you to pick and pack items in real-time.
virtual.selectPackageType: Please select the package type you gonna use

prepare.title: Prepare Your Way
prepare.description: Optimize the item picking sequence by reordering the items to be shipped. Follow the guided process step-by-step for a smooth packaging experience.

general.addAll: If all the products fit in the package, press Add.
general.packageFull: If the package is full and you cannot add anymore, press Package Full.

extra.partialAdd: If only some items fit in the package, add the quantity that fits, then press Package Full and add the remaining.

confirm.title: Confirm the Shipment
confirm.description: Ensure all items are collected and packed properly. You can also adjust the tracking codes and finalize package details.

error.cannotRemoveWithItems: You cannot remove a package that contains items. Remove the items first.
error.noStockForProduct: There is no stock for the selected product in the location. Please restock and try again. The process cannot continue!
error.inventoryMovementFailed: Failed to move inventory for the package. Please try again.
error.quantityExceedsAvailable: The quantity entered exceeds the available quantity. Please adjust the quantity.

packageType.error: Please select a valid package type.

packageFull.error: The package is full. You cannot add more items.

packageSave.success: The package has been saved successfully.
packageSave.error: Failed to save the package. Please try again.

virtual.confirmationSuccess: The package has been confirmed successfully.

manual.title: Manual Packaging Entry
manual.description: Ideal for logging already packed items. Create packages and assign items to them after packing is completed.

createStep.title: Create Your Packages
createStep.description: In this step, you can create and organize your packages. Add boxes or pallets and define their details such as tracking information, shipping label, and customs documents.

assignItemsStep.title: Assign Items to Packages
assignItemsStep.description: In this step, you will assign items to each package based on your shipment. Drag and drop items into the respective packages, and confirm quantities where necessary.
assignItemsStep.success: Items have been successfully assigned to the package.

error.noItemsInPackage: You cannot finish the process. At least one package has no items assigned. Add items or remove the package.
error.cannotRemoveWithItems: Cannot remove the package because it contains assigned items.
error.packageCreationFailed: Failed to create the package. Please try again.
error.inventoryMovementFailed: Failed to move inventory for the package. Please try again.

messages.createError: An error occurred while creating the inventory movement.

location.content: This you physical location, where the inventory is located.  More locations can be added via Shipping Address in settings.

name.content: The name of your location.  For example:  Rack A, Shelf 3, Location: 12 could make: A-3-12.

description.content: Anything that helps you and your team understand this location.  Treat it as a note taking field.

precise.content: Is this location detailed and specific? For example, a location like 'Rack A, Shelf 3, Location 12' is very precise. On the other hand, a location described as 'Building 1' is not very precise.

help.salable: Items that are available for sale
help.physical: Physically on stock, could be reserved, could be salable.
help.reserved: Items that have been sold but not shipped
help.awaitInventory: Items that has been ordered but didn't arrived yet.

prices.confirmCurrencyChange: The current changes will be lost, are you sure you want to change the currency?
prices.updatedError: Price for currency {currency} is wrong. Please adjust it!

toast.bulkDeleteError: Failed to delete price lists. Please try again.

name.content: Name your pice list. Eg Wholesale Europe.

discountAmount.content: The discount amount section refers to the percentage of the discount.

currency.content: The currency for the price-list. For example EUR.

customers.content: Optional field, if you want this price-list to be used for specific customers only.

vatIncluded.content: If you're selling including VAT, eg to end consumers mark as True. For trade customers, mark as False.

autoUpdate.content: Enable it if you want to auto-update the prices for all the products based on currency changes.

discountPercentage.content: What percentage discount would you like to apply to the products assigned to this list?  For a 20% discount, write 20.

dateRange.content: Specify the start and end dates for the price list to be active. You can also leave these empty for a permanent price list.

autoUpdatePrices.content: Enable it if you want to keep prices updated based on currency changes.

priceChangePcnt.content: How would you like to influence the maximum price?  Write 20 to increase it with 20%.  Or -20 to decrease with 20%

product.content: Select the product you want to include in the price list.

priceOverride.content: Set a manual price for this item. If 'Auto Update Prices' is enabled in the price list, this overrides the automatically calculated price. If 'Auto Update Prices' is not enabled, this will be the actual price.

discountOverride.content: Set a manual discount for this item. If 'Auto Update Prices' is enabled in the price list, this overrides the automatically calculated discount. If 'Auto Update Prices' is not enabled, this will be the actual discount.

priceAuto.content: This price is automatically calculated based on the base product price and the price change percentage. This option is only available if 'Auto Update Prices' is enabled in the price list.

discountAuto.content: This discount is automatically calculated based on the base product price and the discount percentage. This option is only available if 'Auto Update Prices' is enabled in the price list.

product.addLater: This can be empty. You can add the products later.

show.title: Image
show.updateFailed: Failed to update the image. Please contact the administrators!

show.title: Video
show.unsupportedFormatError: This video format is not supported by your browser!
show.updateFailed: Failed to update the video. Please contact the administrators!

name.content: The name of the currency, eg: British Pound.

isoCode.content: Official 3 letter code of the currency, eg: GBP.

symbol.content: The symbol for the currency, eg: Â£.

isDefaultCurrency.content: The standard currency for your organisation. There can be only 1.

inheritsFrom.content: What currency should the prices be converted against? Eg select GBP if you're creating EUR.

followOfficialRate.content: If you want to follow the official exchange rates, you should select this. If you have your own rates, mark this as False.

exchangeRate.content: Fill in your own rates in this field if you have them.

roundPricesUpTo.content: When prices are calculated for this currency, do you want to round them up to 1, or 10, or .95 etc.

comment.content: No special action here, just a field for note taking.

create.title: Create Demo Data
create.content: You can create demo data to explore the features of our application.

alert.title: Are you sure?
alert.text: This will create demo data in your account. Do you want to proceed?

create.successfullyCreated: Demo data will be added momentarily.

delete.title: Delete Demo Data
delete.content: You can delete the demo data from your account.

alert.title: Are you sure?
alert.text: This will delete all demo data from your account. Do you want to proceed?

delete.successfullyDelete: Demo data will be removed momentarily.

labels.outOfStock: Lead time when out of stock

descriptionCard.title: Give your brands a voice
descriptionCard.content: Add a custom description for this brand to guide how it's represented in AI-generated content. You can create different descriptions for different languages. If the language is left empty, this will act as the default description for the brand.

network.error: Failed to fetch data from the server. Please check your connection.

error.duplicate: Property with that name already exists.

toast.bulkDeleteError: Failed to delete properties. Please try again.

stepOne.title: General
stepOne.content: Choose a name for your property

stepTwo.title: Type
stepTwo.content: Select the right type for your property

example.text: Adjustable for every product.  Eg: Made in the workshop of Philip Webb during his early period. (Max 255 characters)
example.description: Identical to short description, but store more than 255 characters
example.datetime: Usable to set a date and time
example.select: Choose a single option from predefined values. Eg size or color selection.  Usable for product-filtering on websites.
example.multiselect: Choose multiple options from predefined values. Useful for attributes like washing instructions. Usable for product-filtering on websites where supported.

help.isPublicInformation: Public information will sync to various integrations and websites.
help.addToFilters: Can be used for product filtering in website integrations.
help.hasImage: Enable if the property require images. It applies only to select and multi select type..

duplicateModal.title: Properties with Similar Names Found
duplicateModal.content: We've found properties with similar names listed below. If none of them match what you're trying to create, you can continue and add your new property.

toast.bulkDeleteError: Failed to delete property values. Please try again.

merge.title: Merge Values
merge.description: Select the value to keep. Other selected values will be merged into it and deleted.
merge.detailDescription: All selected values will be merged into "{value}" and deleted.
merge.warning: All other values will be deleted.

help.type: Select how this property should be handled for the product.

preview.productText: Configuration of {name} products will look like:
preview.productTextDisclaimer: If {name} products are offered as Configurable products, the configurator properties will be used.  Otherwise they will be treated as required properties
preview.requiredInConfiguratorText: {name} will be show to the user as a choice.
preview.optionalInConfiguratorText: {name} will be shown as a choice only if there are other variations available.
preview.requiredText: {name} is required to complete the product information
preview.optionalText: {name} is optional and not required to complete the product information

productView.optionalInConfiguratorTextMoreValues: If there are multiple options available it will show like this
productView.optionalInConfiguratorTextOneValue: If there is only one value available, this is what it will look like

error.noRequiredInConfigurator: To use Optional in Configurator ensure you have at least one Required in Configurator setting present.
error.optionalWithoutRequired: Ensure there is at least one Required in Configurator options selected before adding Optional in Configurator settings.
error.noAddedProperties: You need to add some properties for the rule!

toast.bulkDeleteError: Failed to delete rules. Please try again.

requiredInConfigurator.title: Required in Configurator
requiredInConfigurator.example: Select if you wish to allow customers to make a selection through Configurable products. Will be treated as required property.

optionalInConfigurator.title: Optional in Configurator
optionalInConfigurator.example: Similar to Required in Configurator, but only if there are different choices available.

required.title: Required
required.example: This property will be enforced as required on products with the selected product-type.

filled.title: Done
filled.example: This property has a value ad is ready to go.

optional.title: Optional
optional.example: This property will be added on the product pages, but not enforced as required.

configTypes.helpText: The Required in Configurator and Optional in Configurator are relevant only for Configurable products only.  On other product-types they will simply act as a required properties.
configTypes.title: How should the property behave for this product-type?

pullData.success: Website, languages and currencies pulled successfully.
pullData.error: Failed to pull remote data. Please try again.

noImportBanner.title: First Import Not Completed
noImportBanner.content: We highly recommend running an import after creating the integration to ensure that we start from the same data point and avoid inconsistencies. If is already created wait for it to finish.

shopifyNotConnectedBanner.title: Shopify connection not completed
shopifyNotConnectedBanner.content: The app authorization did not complete or was aborted. Please retry to connect.

amazonNotConnectedBanner.title: Amazon connection not completed
amazonNotConnectedBanner.content: The app authorization did not complete or was aborted. Please retry to connect.

rules.content: Think of price lists like calendars for your prices. When you add price lists to a sales channel, we first look for a list whose dates include today. If we can't find one, we use the list without dates, the default. If there is no default, we use the base price in that currency. Each sales channel can only have one default list and its dated lists cannot overlap.

help.productTypeCode: Amazon identifier for this product type.
help.productName: Provide a product name and Amazon will suggest matching types.
help.productRule: Select the local product rule to link with this Amazon product type.

help.type: Type mapped from Amazon. Cannot be changed.
help.allowsUnmappedValues: Allow values that have not been mapped locally.
help.name: Name from Amazon. You can modify it.
help.property: Select the local property this Amazon property maps to.

help.amazonProperty: Amazon property to which this value belongs.
help.localProperty: OneSila property that this Amazon property maps to.
help.remoteValue: Value exactly as defined in Amazon.
help.remoteName: Name from Amazon. You can change it.
help.selectValue: Choose the OneSila value that matches this Amazon value.

notMappedBanner.title: Amazon property not mapped
notMappedBanner.content: Map the Amazon property first before mapping values.

create.title: Create Integration
create.success: Your integration has been successfully created!

step1.title: Select Integration Type
step1.content: Please select the type of integration you would like to create.
step1.magentoExample: Integrate with Magento to manage your online store seamlessly.
step1.shopifyExample: Shopify integration to manage your products in seconds.
step1.amazonExample: Amazon integration to manage your marketplace listings.
step1.woocommerceExample: WooCommerce integration to manage your products.
step1.webhookExample: Send events to your application via HTTP

magentoInfoModal.title: How to connect your Magento store

section.integrationDescription: Before connecting your store, make sure to create and activate an integration in your Magento Admin Panel.
section.integrationStep2: Click on 'Add New Integration' create the integration and activate it
section.apiSettingsDescription: In order for the integration to work smoothly, please check the following settings in your Magento Admin:
section.apiSetting1: 'Allow OAuth Access Tokens to be used as standalone Bearer tokens' â†’ Yes (mandatory, located under: Stores â†’ Configuration â†’ Services â†’ OAuth â†’ OAuth Customer Settings)
section.apiSetting2: 'Allow Anonymous Guest Access' â†’ Yes (optional, located under: Stores â†’ Configuration â†’ Services â†’ Magento Web API â†’ Web API Security)
section.legacyAuthWarning: You can connect using username and password, but we strongly discourage it due to lower security and possible compatibility issues.
section.importRecommendation: After setting up the integration, we recommend performing an import to bring your existing Magento data into our system. This avoids syncing issues later on.
section.eanDescription: If you want to sync EAN codes, make sure you have an attribute with global scope in Magento. Don't worry, missing ones can also be created during the import process.

woocommerceInfoModal.title: How to connect your WooCommerce store
woocommerceInfoModal.integrationDescription: Before connecting your store, you need to create API credentials in your WooCommerce admin panel.
woocommerceInfoModal.integrationStep1: Go to WooCommerce â†’ Settings â†’ Advanced â†’ REST API
woocommerceInfoModal.integrationStep2: Click 'Add Key' and create a new API key
woocommerceInfoModal.apiSettingsDescription: Ensure your WooCommerce store has the following settings:
woocommerceInfoModal.importRecommendation: After setting up the integration, we recommend performing an import to bring your existing WooCommerce data into our system.
woocommerceInfoModal.eanDescription: If you want to sync EAN codes, make sure you have a custom field or attribute set up in WooCommerce for EAN codes.

shopifyInfoModal.title: How to connect your Shopify store

section.integrationDescription: Follow these steps using your Shopify admin account:
section.integrationStep1: From your Shopify admin dashboard, open Settings.
section.integrationStep2: Use the search bar to find 'App development'.
section.integrationStep3: If prompted, click 'Allow custom app development' and confirm.
section.integrationStep4: Choose 'Create an app', give it a name like 'OneSila' and wait for it to finish.
section.integrationStep5Part1: Open the new app and go to 'Configuration'.
section.integrationStep5Part2: Under 'Admin API integration' click 'Configure' and enable these scopes:
section.integrationStep6Part1: In 'API credentials' select 'Install app' and confirm.
section.integrationStep6Part2: Now the API key, API secret key and Admin API access token are ready for the last step of this wizard.
section.integrationStep7: From the Sales channels sidebar choose 'View your online store' and copy the URL from your browser and paste it in the step 2 of this wizard.
section.integrationStep8: During step 4 of the wizard paste the API key, secret key and access token, then click Finish.

step2.title: General Information
step2.content: Enter your integration's hostname and connection settings.

step3.title: Sales Channel Preferences
step3.content: Quickly adjust your channel preferences for syncing.

magento.content: Provide Magento-specific information to connect your store.

shopify.content: Provide Shopify-specific configuration to connect your store.

webhook.title: Webhook Settings
webhook.content: Configure your webhook endpoint and options.

installed.title: Shopify Connected
installed.success: Your Shopify store was successfully connected!
installed.genericError: Something went wrong while connecting your store.
installed.missingParams: Missing required query parameters. Please retry the installation.

retry.failedGeneric: Retry failed. Could not update Shopify channel.
retry.failedRedirect: Retry failed. Could not obtain redirect URL.
retry.failedException: Retry failed due to a system error.

installed.title: Amazon Connected
installed.success: Your Amazon store was successfully connected!
installed.genericError: Something went wrong while connecting your store.
installed.missingParams: Missing required query parameters. Please retry the installation.

toast.resyncSuccess: The product resync process has begun. Please come later to see the results.
toast.fetchIssuesSuccess: Product issues were refreshed from the remote server.
toast.validateSuccess: The product validation process has begun. Please come later to see the results.

helpText.useConfigurableName: If enabled, the system will always use the configurable (parent) product's name for variations.
helpText.syncContents: Toggle this to synchronize product content from the remote system and keep your product details up-to-date.
helpText.syncEanCodes: Toggle this to ensure your product's EAN codes are synchronized with the remote system.
helpText.syncPrices: Toggle this to keep the product pricing updated in the remote system.
helpText.importOrders: Toggle this to allow the system to import integration orders to be able to process and do things as suggesting related products.
helpText.cannotAssign: Please fix the content quality before adding a new website assign.
helpText.requestsPerMinute: Set the max API requests per minute. This helps prevent throttling while keeping your connection smooth.
helpText.maxRequestsPerMinute: This store only allows up to {max} requests per minute.
helpText.maxRetries: Enter a number (1â€“20) for retry attempts. A higher value may overcome temporary issues but might delay error alerts.
helpText.hostApiKey: Your Access Token is available in Magento under System > Integrations.
helpText.password: Using a password is not recommended. Use an Access Token instead.
helpText.shopifyVendorProperty: This must be a property of type Select. Its selected value will be sent as the product's vendor in Shopify.

helpText.url: Endpoint that will receive webhook POST requests.
helpText.topic: Event topic that triggers the webhook.
helpText.timeoutMs: Milliseconds to wait for a response before failing.
helpText.mode: Use 'delta' for changes only or 'full' for the entire payload.
helpText.retentionPolicy: How long webhook deliveries are retained.

infoBlock.description: Webhooks send POST requests to your endpoint when events occur. Use the examples below to configure your handler.

retry.error: Retry import process had an unexpected error

types.schemaDescription: Initial setup required to enable product imports.
types.productsDescription: Imports actual product data from Amazon.
types.schemaRequired: Please complete the schema import first.

step1.title: Languages & Currencies
step1.content: Please map your remote languages and currencies to the local ones. All entries are required to continue.
step1.noData: No languages or currencies available. Please try again later.
step1.fetchError: An error occurred while fetching remote languages and currencies.

step2.title: Select Attributes
step2.content: Select the attributes you want to import

description.attributes: Please select the attributes that you want to import into your system. Include both frontend-visible properties and internal Magento attributes managed by extensions.
description.eanCode: Select which attribute will be used as the EAN code. If you don't have one yet but want to sync EAN codes using OneSila, you can create it now.

step3.title: Default Attribute Set
step3.helpText: The selected attribute set defines the initial structure of your product attributes. Additional properties managed in OneSila will be added afterwards.

finish.title: Finalizing Import
finish.errorMessage: An error occurred at step "{step}". Please try again.
